org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Class LibGdxGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.LibGdxGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graphics

    public class LibGdxGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graphics
    LibGDX implementation of Graphics

        drawString in interface Graphics

        text - The String to draw
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at

      • drawString

        public void drawString(java.lang.String text,
                       float x,
                       float y,
                       float targetWidth,
                       int horizontalAlign)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Draws a string to the window, automatically wrapping it within a specified width and aligning it to the left, center or right of the width
        Specified by:
        drawString in interface Graphics
        Parameters:
        text - The String to draw
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at
        targetWidth - The width to render the String at. Note: The string will automatically wrapped if it is longer.
        horizontalAlign - The horizontal alignment. Note: Use Align to retrieve the appropriate value.
